full_description: use the left arm to pick up the block from point A and place it at point B, then use the right arm to press the bell, finally use the left arm to pick up the block from point B and place it back at point A.
schema: {A} notifies the block, {B} notifies the intermediate point B, {C} notifies the bell, {a} notifies the left arm, {b} notifies the right arm
preference: num of words should not exceed 15. Degree of detail avg is six.
seen: Pick {A} from A, place at {B}, press {C}, then put back to A.
Use {a} to move {A} to {B}, press {C} with {b}, then return {A} to A.

Pick {A}, drop at {B}, hit {C}, then place {A} back at A.
Move block to center, press bell, then move block back.

Place {A} on {B}, activate {C}, then return {A}.
Shift {A} to {B}, ring {C}, then shift {A} back.
